root.name: Baron Wittard: Nemesis of Ragnarok
root.description: Baron Wittard was published in the English language in Europe and America by Iceberg Interactive on the 18th of Feb 2011. It has since been released in other languages, including French, German, Italian and Portuguese. Baron Wittard was the first commercial desktop game to be published using the DX Studio engine by Worldweaver Productions.Baron Wittard is a first-person solitary exploration adventure game for the Windows PC, and also runs unofficially on both Mac and Linux. The story focuses on anonymous urban photographer who becomes trapped at the center of a battle between good and evil at the time of Ragnarok.
